lines.text: Eh, what's up Doc? You with the sideshow around here?
I'm no Doc, ya flea-bitten varmint! I'm Riff-Raff Sam, the riffiest riff that ever riffed a raft!
Great horney toads! A trespasser, gettin' footie prints all over my desert!
Man, dig this crazy beach. Must be low tide.
Hey, there's a park over there. Wonder if that's where the water is?
[At the oasis he finds a small watering hole]
So this is the Big Pond. Big deal! I always pictured the Atlantic Ocean as so much bigger.
Now I hope that'll learn ya, you humpbacked muley!
[Sam is opening a series of doors; the last one is rigged to explosives]
I wonder if he's stubborn enough to open all those doors?
